item.description:
All levels are welcome. Please post if you plan to take the lesson.

Please let us know if you are able to carpool and let us know if you will be needing a ride. A cost of $13 per rider will be paid directly to the driver for gas coverage.

 

Good morning everyone,

Due to the lack of interest to purchase a lesson package or lift tickets from Pats Peak, we are not able to take advantage of the group discounts offered by them.  The number needed to complete a group was fifteen and we currently have only eight. Therefore, the following will be the prices-

 

1. For the beginners whom are taking a lesson, the package price is $80 and it include the lesson and all the necessary gear, except helmet($10).  Place an online order by following the link below and scroll down to "Starter Special" then place an order for "Starter Special: Snowboarding"

http://www.patspeak.com/shop/product.php?tid=2&usage_date=2013-01-12

 

2. If you need lift tickets only, Pats Peak price is $60; however, Sherry may be able to get them for $42.  Sherry, how many can you get?  Otherwise, the link below will take you to Pats Peak's lift tickets online ordering page.

http://www.patspeak.com/shop/product.php?tid=23&usage_date=2013-01-12

 

3.  If you need only a lift ticket and rent gear(helmet not included, $10); Pats Peak offer a value package for $86.  You can make an online reservation at least two hours before arriving to the site.

Follow the following link and scroll down to "Lift Ticket and Snowboard Rental Package"

http://www.patspeak.com/shop/product.php?tid=2&usage_date=2013-01-12

 

My sincere apologies for the inconvenience, and hope you all can still make the trip.

 

Volunteer drivers and passengers:

As of today, the following is the drivers and passengers list.

1. Driver: Brenda(Quincy)-  Brenda's passenger(s): 1.Aaron.

2. Driver: Phillip Tat(Quincy)- Passenger(s)

3. Driver: Hanlu(Sommerville?)- Passenger(s): 1. Sherry, 2.Jenny

4. Driver: Ying Chen(Allston)- Passenger(s):

5. Driver: Thach(Medford)- Passenger(s):

The following members whom are still in need of a ride are:

1. Trang(Brighton)

2. Vay(Lowell)

3. Ankur(Kendall/MIT)

 

Best,

Julio

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Snowboarding, all levels welcome
